ProductInventoryBatchSearchableField.name: ProductInventoryBatchSearchableField
ProductInventoryBatchSearchableField.description: Represents production batch data used for inventory search, including batch item details for a specific location. This data serves as the basis for Criteria-Based and Filter Search, which combines batch details with standard inventory dimensions.

Product2.description: The product record associated with the record.

ProductName.description: The name of the product related to a product item.

TotalQuantityUnitOfMeasure.description: Specifies the unit of measure for the total quantity at location.

ProductItem.description: The product item record associated with the record.

BusinessBrand.description: The business brand record associated with the record.

BusinessBrandName.description: The name of the business brand of a product item.

MakeName.description: The make name of a product item.

ModelName.description: The model name of a product item.

ModelYear.description: The model year of a product item.

ProductCode.description: The product code for identifying a product item.

IsProductSerialized.description: Indicates whether the product related to a product item is a serialized product (true) or not (false).

UniversalProductCode.description: The universal product code that's used to track the product item.

ManufacturerPartNumber.description: The unique number assigned by the manufacturer to identify a product item.

ProductDescription.description: The description of a product item.

ProductFamily.description: Specifies the product family to which a product item belongs.

ProductLineCode.description: The product line category of a product item.

ProductCategoryCode.description: The product category code of a product item.

ProductManufacturerName.description: The name of the manufacturer that manufactured a product item.

ProductVersionName.description: The version name of a product item.

HarmonizedSystemCode.description: The harmonized system code that's assigned to the product item.

IsEnvrPrtcRegCompliant.description: Indicates whether the product item is compliant with environment protection regulations (true) or not (false).

InventoryLocation.description: The location record associated with the record.

InventoryLocationName.description: The name inventory location for a product item.

InvLocationCoord.description: The latitude and longitude coordinates of an inventory location for a product item.

InventoryLocationType.description: The type of an inventory location for a product item.

ParentInventoryLocation.description: The parent inventory location associated with the record.

ParentInventoryLocationName.description: The name of the parent inventory location for a product item.

ParentInventoryLocationType.description: The type of the parent inventory location for a product item.

Account.description: The account associated with the record.

AccountName Batch.description: The name of the account related to a product item.

ProductionBatch.description: The batch associated with the product item record.

BatchName.description: The name of batch related to a product item.

BatchIdentificationNumber.description: The unique identification number of the batch.

BatchCreatedDate.description: The date and time when the batch is created.

BatchManufacturedDate.description: The manufactured date and time for the batch.

BatchExpirationDate.description: The date and time when the batch expires. .

BatchCreationLocation.description: The batch creation location associated with the batch.

BatchCreationLocationName.description: The name of the location where the batch is created.

BatchManufacturingLocation.description: The manufacturing location record associated with the batch.

BatchManufacturingLocationName.description: The manufacturing location of the batch.

IsBatchActive.description: Indicates whether the batch status is active(true) or not (false).

BatchOriginType.description: Specifies the orgin type of the batch.

ProductBatchItem.description: The product item associated with the batch.

ProductBatchItemName.description: The name of the product item associated with the batch.

ProductBatchItemQuantity.description: The quantity of the product items in the batch.

IsProductBatchItemActive.description: Indicates whether the product batch item status is active(true) or not (false).

ProductBatchItemAssignee.description: The assignee associated with the product batch item.

ProductBatchItemAssigneeName.description: The name of the assignee associated with the product batch item.
